text: Dhugumatti, si dura ergamtoota erginee jirraIsaan irraa warra seenaa isaanii siif himnetu jiraIsaan irraas warra seenaa isaanii siif hin himintu jiruErgamaan tokko hayyama Rabbiitiin ala keeyyata tokko fiduu hin danda’uYeroo ajajni Rabbii dhufe, (dhimmichi) dhugaan murteeffamaKijibdoonni achitti ni hoonga’u
